955710.name: Baba Is You Soundtrack
955710.description:
The original soundtrack of the game Baba Is You. Whoa!

Track list:
1. Intro
2. Baba Is You
3. On the island
4. Wall Is Stop
5. Water Is Sink
6. Cog Is Push
7. Leaf Is Move
8. Box Has Key
9. Tree Is Shift
10. Rocket Is Dust
11. Tree Has Fruit
12. Lava Is Hot
13. Bird Is Float
14. Flag Is Win
15. Crystal Is Still
16. Cursor Is Select
17. Reed Is Sad
18. Keke Is Party
19. Baba Fear Ghost

High-quality MP3 & FLAC files included.

Composed by Arvi Teikari.
